name: Coronation Chicken
author: CZARDAS
summary: A creamy chicken and mango dish with a spicy curried mayonnaise dressing, is something fresh and different that always brings interest and recipe requests. Served cold with a crisp garden or rice salad. This also makes a wonderful sandwich filling.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) large mango, peeled, thinly sliced
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper
directions: In a large pot, cook chicken in lightly salted boiling water for 20 minutes
Drain, cool, and cut into 1/2-inch strips
In a large bowl, stir together chicken strips, raisins, and half of the mango
In a medium bowl, mix together mayonnaise, curry powder, chutney, and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper, then toss gently with chicken mixture
Transfer to a platter, and garnish with remaining mango strips and cashews
